Breitbart Alumni Launch 'Populist-Nationalist' Group - The Atlantic
extended: Former Breitbart News reporters are founding a pro-Trump advocacy group. Patrick Howley, a former Breitbart News reporter, left the site under vague circumstances back in November.

description: I Dropped Acid and Saw Into the Future: My Surreal First Time At CES - The Daily Beast
extended: What finally brought me to the edge of emotional break was the carpeting. There’s nothing particularly special about the carpeting in the Las Vegas Convention center. It’s bright red, crisscrossed with other primary colors, loud like most convention center carpets. Easy to clean.

description: Watch 'Relatively Free,' Alex Winter's Barrett Brown Documentary | The Daily Dot
extended: A new short film by actor and cybercrime documentarian Alex Winter offers a glance at Barrett Brown's first moments of freedom since the 35-year-old journalist was incarcerated in the summer of 2012.
